item.title: The right people
item.author: Kamil
item.description: Each of us has some ideal places, songs, people and the way how the morning coffee should be prepared. Sometimes the way how negative situations happen describe the way our day, week, life look like. The way we are. Funnily enough, very often those things or people are just happening around us, the way we often donâ€™t even notice it. We often can only notice the result of all those things.
